events.message: Customer submitted a claim reporting a car accident that occurred on April 28th. Vehicle was involved in a rear-end collision at a traffic stop.
The claim was reviewed and categorized under Auto Accident due to references to a car collision and vehicle damage.
An agent specializing in auto claims was assigned to handle the customer's accident claim and coordinate next steps.
Acknowledgement sent to customer confirming receipt of the auto accident claim with assurance of prompt assistance.
Customer was requested to submit photos of vehicle damage, police report, and any witness statements related to the collision.
Customer uploaded all requested documents including detailed photos and the official police report for assessment.
Investigation team began review of submitted materials and initiated contact with involved parties and witnesses.
The investigation concluded with confirmation that the customer was not at fault and all damages were consistent with the collision.
A settlement offer covering vehicle repair costs and rental car reimbursement was proposed and sent to the customer.
Customer responded positively, thanking the team for efficient handling and expressing satisfaction with the proposed settlement.
The claim was officially approved based on investigation outcomes and customer acceptance of the proposed settlement.
Payment covering the agreed settlement amount was issued to the customerâ€™s bank account to cover vehicle repairs.
The claim was closed following successful payment and confirmation from customer that repairs were completed satisfactorily.
